post.author: 김유나
post.content:
회사정보
회사명 Barry Robertson & Associates

주소 Canada Ontario  
  130 george Henry Blvd., suite 219 Toronto M2J 1G3

홈페이지  

회사소개 Placement Agency


채용정보
직종 전산직  

직무 Computer programmer

고용형태 Temporary, Full Time  

모집기간  As soon as possible

급여 $30.00 to $40.00 Hourly for 40

근무지 Canada   Ontario Toronto North  


지원자격
학력 Completion of high school  

자격증 Information Systems Professional (ISP)

경력 3 - 5 years

필요한기술 The main responsibility is to work on specific modules of code on Mackintosh. Must have Real Basic programming language with some C++ along with an understanding of Digital Audio.

기타 Hardware Environment: Apple Macintosh
Programming Languages: C++, HTML, Object-Oriented programming languages, Basic
Other: Genetic algorithms



지원방법
지원방법 By Mail/By Phone /By E-mail  

담당자  

전화 416- 496- 1505  

팩스번호 - -

post.title: Computer programmer
